Reviews.Title: “dont get room 132 if there is a function on”
Reviews.Author: sheilamarshall
Reviews.Content: trip winchester brilliant despite pool sauna facilities closed repair food accomodation staff helpful friendly function loud couldnt hear tv properly 132 night dont directly function finish 1130 charity help mention

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, but disappointing visit”
Reviews.Author: Morrie
Reviews.Content: wife stayed winchester hotel weekend 17th 18th december 2011 hotel modern reception staff pleasant helpful located town centre short walk secure parking available hotel car park albeit served basis unsecure parking front hotel unfortunately hotel busy evening stay christmas parties detriment allocated 1 located adjacent hotel entrance disturbed hours sunday morning smokers standing outside entrance window revellers leaving booked heritage break includes 3 course dinner saturday night whilst food looked taste dine restaurant disappointed breakfast morning served cold plates food hot night slept breakfast morning service stay winchester hotel request rear hotel definately eat
